Html:
I can't find the property in the class hierarchy where I can adjust, that the job should also run when no user is logged in. Can anyone help ;-)

Thx Hans

You need to register the task with a password or (on Win Vista and later) S4U. See https://taskscheduler.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TaskSecurity&referringTitle=Documentation#user and supply the appropriate TaskLogonType.
